name: Buzzing Out: Dragonfly to the rescue
name_original: Buzzing Out: Dragonfly to the rescue
description:
Our submission for the Score Space Jam game jam!

Buzzing Out - A Dragon fly to the Rescue! Save your bug friends and combine strenghts to scape this death trap!

Game Comands:

AWSD - Movement,
Space - Shoot Bees,
LeftShift - Cricket Shield Boost,
P - Pause
